Function Documentation

int blinkLight ( int  on,
int  off,
int  num 
)

Switch the light over the lcd on and off (blinking).

Parameters:
on The time how long the light is switched on
off The time how long the light is switched off
num How often the light switching between on and off
Returns:
The return value is 0 if all is okay or -1 if they was an error

int blinkMorseChar ( char  c  ) 

This function takes a char, and blinks than the letter in morsecode. Morsecode ("." = short alias point, "-" = long alias line):

a -> .- n -> -. b -> -... o -> --- c -> -.-. p -> .--. d -> -.. q -> --.- e -> . r -> .-. f -> ..-. s -> ... g -> --. t -> - h -> .... u -> ..- i -> .. v -> ...- j -> .--- w -> .-- k -> -.- x -> -..- l -> .-.. y -> -.-- m -> -- z -> --..

1 -> .---- 6 -> -.... 2 -> ..--- 7 -> --... 3 -> ...-- 8 -> ---.. 4 -> ....- 9 -> ----. 5 -> ..... 0 -> -----

Parameters:
c The char for the morsecode
Returns:
int The return value is 0 if all is okay or -1 if they was an error
